# Problem 1

We first import `Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx`.

We omit non-data entries

```{r}
library(readxl)
TrashWheel_df = read_excel("data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx", 
                           skip = 1, range = "A2:N408")

TrashWheel_df = janitor::clean_names(TrashWheel_df)
names(TrashWheel_df)
view(TrashWheel_df)
TrashWheel_df
```
